/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. On either side of the street, lush green trees and bushes add a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
